utilMDE
Class FileCompiler

java.lang.Object
  utilMDE.FileCompiler

public final class FileCompiler
extends java.lang.Object

This class has a method compile_source which can be used to compile Java source. It invokes a user-specified external command, such as javac or jikes.

FileCompiler(String, long)

FileCompiler

public FileCompiler(java.lang.String compiler,
                    long timeLimit)
Creates a new FileCompiler.

Parameters:
compiler - A command that runs a Java compiler; for instance, it could be the full path name or whatever is used on the commandline.
timeLimit - The maximum permitted compilation time, in msec.
